/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings flank the street, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements, contributing to the urban atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, offering a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and textures of the city.
